front.title: Superpowered Drug Dealer
front.setup: Place Skidmark in play, "Superpowered Drug Dealer" side up. Place the Merchant Influence card into play. Put 3 * H tokens on it.
front.gameplay:
If there are ever 0 tokens on the Merchant Influence card, the heroes win the game.
If there are ever more than 5 * H tokens on the Merchant Influence card, the heroes lose the game.
At the start of the villain turn, add H - 1 tokens to the Merchant Influence card.
Reduce damage dealt to villain targets by 1
When this target is destroyed, flip it instead

back.title: Defeated Drug Dealer
back.gameplay:
If there are ever 0 tokens on the Merchant Influence card, the heroes win the game.
If there are ever more than 5 * H tokens on the Merchant Influence card, the heroes lose the game.
At the start of the villain turn, add 1 token to the Merchant Influence card

front.text:
This card is indestructible. This card is immune to environmental damage.
Whenever this card would take damage, prevent the damage and remove X tokens, where X = the amount of damage it would have taken

card.name: Festival of Blood
card.text: Increase damage dealt by villain targets by 1

card.name: Festival of Excess
card.text: Reduce damage dealt to villain targets by 1

card.name: Festival of Love
card.text: At the start of the villain turn, add H - 2 tokens to the Merchant Influence card

card.name: The Scum of Society
card.text: Whenever a non-hero target is destroyed, add 1 token to the Merchant Influence card

card.name: Not Exactly Sanitary
card.text: Whenever a villain target deals non-toxic damage to another target, the villain target deals 1 toxic damage to that target

card.name: A Wall of Bodies
card.text: Reduce damage dealt to villain targets other than the Merchant Influence card by 1 for every H tokens on the Merchant Influence card

card.name: Riot
card.text: Merchant Influence deals X melee damage to all hero targets, where X = the number of tokens on the Merchant Influence card / H (round up)

card.name: The Animal Beneath
card.text: Merchant Influence deals H psychic damage to the hero target with the highest HP

card.name: Squealer
card.text: Ignore villain targets when determining targeting for damage from environmental cards. At the start of the villain turn, play the top card in the environment deck

card.name: Mush
card.text: This card is immune to melee and projectile damage. At the end of the villain turn, Mush deals 1 melee damage to all hero targets

card.name: Scrub
card.text: At the end of the villain turn, Scrub deals 5 energy damage to all targets (except himself) with a HP evenly divisible by 3

card.name: Helicopter
card.text: Skidmark is immune to melee damage. At the end of the villain turn, add 1 token to the Merchant Influence card
